review: I don't get all the positive reviews.  This devices was extremely easy to hook up.  From box to working in less than 5 minutes.  But after that, I just don't understand how this thing is useful.  I usually hook up my laptop to my tv to screen media.  This device didn't give me anything my laptop doesn't.  I don't get the $99 price tag for something that doesn't do what I already have.g
